price: Atë Ditë Ne do ta pyesim Xhehenemin: “A u mbushe?” e ai do të përgjigjet: “A ka edhe më?”
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ ٱمۡتَلَأۡتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلۡ مِن مَّزِيدٖ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: yawma naqūlu lijahannama hali im'talati wataqūlu hal min mazīdin
